author: Alan Friedman
title: Galaxy S22 Ultra starts arriving on doorsteps - PhoneArena
description: A man in France reported receiving his Galaxy S22 Ultra today, five days before the official release date. On the other hand, one poor soul won't get his Galaxy S22 until May 2nd.
